key_risks: Intense competition from smartphone manufacturers and rival action camera brands
Declining hardware sales and reliance on unproven subscription services
Supply chain vulnerabilities and reliance on third-party suppliers
Legal troubles with Contour over patent infringement
Operational and financial struggles, including recent losses and layoffs
controversies: Workforce reductions, including layoffs of 135 employees in 2023
Past product failures, such as the discontinuation of the Karma drone
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and using sustainable materials
social_issues: Employee morale concerns due to layoffs and workforce reductions
governance_issues: Execution risks associated with strategic shifts toward subscription services and cost-cutting measures
